definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: The dehydration rate was increased by adding the dosage of desiccants.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥劑劑量愈大，種子失水速度愈快。

sentences.english: Chromate-based pigments as well as Lead salts used as dryers could be substituted.
sentences.chinese: 鉻酸鹽基顏料以及鉛鹽用於乾燥劑可以替代。

sentences.english: Our company is specializing in the production of various types of desiccant moisture production trade type company.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是專業生產各類乾燥劑防潮的生產貿易型公司。

sentences.english: Try drying it with a desiccant and replacing the battery.
sentences.chinese: 你可嘗試使用乾燥劑乾燥它，並更換電池。

sentences.english: Use of a desiccant breather keeps air entering a reservoir clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用了乾燥劑喘息的空氣不斷進入油箱的清潔及乾燥。

sentences.english: This product used in dry of chloroEthylene dilutes chlorpromazine and PTA.
sentences.chinese: 鋁膠乾燥劑本產品專門用於氯丙烯及PTA乾燥。

sentences.english: A new composite desiccant used in the manufacture of dehumidifier was tested.
sentences.chinese: 測試了新型複合乾燥劑和硅膠的平衡吸附性能。

sentences.english: The highly pure mineral stellerite mined in Chetian of Ziyuan Country, Guangxi has been used to make desiccants in our lab.
sentences.chinese: 以高純廣西資源車田紅輝沸石爲主要原料試製乾燥劑。

sentences.english: Product Intro Each 5KG be packed in a vacuumed polybag, enclosed with drier.
sentences.chinese: 每5KG用塑膜真空封裝，並裝入乾燥劑。

sentences.english: Two desiccant bags are delivered in an air-tight package.
sentences.chinese: 氣密性包裝有兩個乾燥劑袋。

sentences.english: NREL uses syrupy liquids which contain salty desiccants to soak up the humidity.
sentences.chinese: NREL使用一種含鹽乾燥劑的糖漿式液體吸走溼氣。

sentences.english: No leak of the water solution and gelled material due to falling off and shaking.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥劑不會因脫落和振動等原因泄漏水溶液或膠狀物。

sentences.english: From the increase in the weight of the desiccant the absolute humidity can be determined.
sentences.chinese: 可從乾燥劑重量的增加來確定絕對溫度。

sentences.english: Generally speaking water-absorbing materials can all be used as a desiccant .
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，吸水性強的物質均可用作乾燥劑。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
